get.summary:
Lists all payment information known by the system for the provided account.
Required permissions:
- read:payment_information

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

get.summary:
Gets the payment information identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- read:payment_information

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: paymentInformationId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the payment information (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

delete.summary:
Delete the payment information identified by the given ID.
Required permissions:
- write:payment_information
TODO: This endpoint is not supported in the current version of the API. Should we remove it from here?

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: paymentInformationId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the payment information (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

put.summary:
Updates the current payment information associated with the account.
After this change, the new payment information will be used for all future charges.
This does not create a new payment information, it simply switches to one already linked to the account.
Required permissions:
- write:payment_information

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description: The identifier of the account (in GUID format).

parameters.name: paymentInformationId
parameters.description: The identifier of the new payment information to set.

post.summary:
Initiates the creation of a Stripe Checkout session for the specified account.
This session can be used by the client (usually via frontend) to interact directly with Stripe's hosted payment page.
Required permissions:
- write:payment_information

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: redirectUrl
parameters.description: Redirect URL to which the user will be redirected after the payment setup is completed.

get.summary:
Get the Stripe Checkout session by its ID.
This method is used to retrieve the session details after it has been created.
Required permissions:
- write:payment_information

parameters.name: accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: sessionId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the Stripe session.
This is a required field.

post.summary:
Creates a new payment information for the account.
This method is used to create a new payment information, which can then be connected to a payment provider (like Stripe).
Required permissions:
- write:payment_information

parameters.name: paymentInformation.accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier for the payment information (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after a payment information is created.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.type
parameters.description:
The type of the payment information provider.
This is a required field.

 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified type, should not be used.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_STRIPE: Stripe payment information.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_AWS_MARKETPLACE: AWS marketplace payment information.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_GCP_MARKETPLACE: Google Cloud Platform marketplace payment information.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_AZURE_MARKETPLACE: Azure marketplace payment information.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_CUSTOM: Custom payment information. This is used for custom payment methods that do not fit into the predefined categories.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.paymentProviderId
parameters.description:
The customer account identifier in the payment provider system.
This is read-only field.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.paymentMethod.id
parameters.description: The identifier of the payment method.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.paymentMethod.card.brand
parameters.description: The brand of the card (e.g., "Visa", "Mastercard").

parameters.name: paymentInformation.paymentMethod.card.last4
parameters.description: The last 4 digits of the card number.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.paymentMethod.card.expirationMonth
parameters.description: The expiration month of the card.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.paymentMethod.card.expirationYear
parameters.description: The expiration year of the card.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.name
parameters.description: The name of the person or entity associated with the billing address.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.line1
parameters.description: The first line of the billing address.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.line2
parameters.description:
The second line of the billing address.
This is an optional field.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.postalCode
parameters.description:
The postal code of the billing address.
This is an optional field.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.city
parameters.description: The city of the billing address.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.state
parameters.description: The state or province of the billing address.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.country
parameters.description: The country of the billing address.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.countryFormatted
parameters.description: The formatted country name.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.stateFormatted
parameters.description: The formatted state or province name.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.billingAddress.taxSupportedCountry
parameters.description: Indicates if the country supports tax.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.createdAt
parameters.description:
The timestamp when the payment information was created.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a payment information is created.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.lastModifiedAt
parameters.description:
The timestamp when the payment information was last updated.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a payment information is created.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.taxId
parameters.description:
The tax ID associated with the payment information.
This is an optional field.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.isDefault
parameters.description:
The us default flag indicates if this payment information is the default one for the account.
Default payment information is used for all charges in the account.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.status
parameters.description:
Payment information status.
This is read-only field.

 - PAYMENT_INFORMATION_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified status, should not be used.
 - PAYMENT_INFORMATION_STATUS_ACTIVE: The payment information is active and can be used for payments.
 - PAYMENT_INFORMATION_STATUS_INACTIVE: The payment information is inactive and cannot be used for payments.
 - PAYMENT_INFORMATION_STATUS_PENDING: The payment information is pending verification or setup.

put.summary:
Updates the payment information for the account.
This method is used to update the payment information details, such as billing address.
Required permissions:
- write:payment_information

parameters.name: paymentInformation.accountId
parameters.description:
The identifier of the account (in GUID format).
This is a required field.

parameters.name: paymentInformation.id
parameters.description:
Unique identifier for the payment information (in GUID format).
This is a read-only field and will be available after a payment information is created.

type.description:
The type of the payment information provider.
This is a required field.

paymentProviderId.description:
The customer account identifier in the payment provider system.
This is read-only field.

paymentMethod.description:
Represents the payment method details, such as card information.
This field is optional and only available for payment provider type Stripe for now.

billingAddress.description:
The billing address associated with the payment information.
This field is optional and only available for payment provider type Stripe.

createdAt.description:
The timestamp when the payment information was created.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a payment information is created.

lastModifiedAt.description:
The timestamp when the payment information was last updated.
This is a read-only field and will be available after a payment information is created.

taxId.description:
The tax ID associated with the payment information.
This is an optional field.

isDefault.description:
The us default flag indicates if this payment information is the default one for the account.
Default payment information is used for all charges in the account.

status.description:
Payment information status.
This is read-only field.

expirationMonth.description: The expiration month of the card.

expirationYear.description: The expiration year of the card.

This is read-only field.

v1PaymentInformation.title:
Represents a payment information.
TODO: Is payment method a better name?

v1PaymentInformationStatus.description:
PaymentInformationStatus defines the status of the payment information.

 - PAYMENT_INFORMATION_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified status, should not be used.
 - PAYMENT_INFORMATION_STATUS_ACTIVE: The payment information is active and can be used for payments.
 - PAYMENT_INFORMATION_STATUS_INACTIVE: The payment information is inactive and cannot be used for payments.
 - PAYMENT_INFORMATION_STATUS_PENDING: The payment information is pending verification or setup.

id.description: The identifier of the payment method.

v1PaymentProviderType.description:
PaymentProviderType defines the type of payment information.

 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_UNSPECIFIED: Unspecified type, should not be used.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_STRIPE: Stripe payment information.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_AWS_MARKETPLACE: AWS marketplace payment information.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_GCP_MARKETPLACE: Google Cloud Platform marketplace payment information.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_AZURE_MARKETPLACE: Azure marketplace payment information.
 - PAYMENT_PROVIDER_TYPE_CUSTOM: Custom payment information. This is used for custom payment methods that do not fit into the predefined categories.

paymentInformation.description: New payment information that has been set for the account.

v1SetDefaultPaymentInformationResponse.description: SetDefaultPaymentInformationResponse is the response returned after a successful update.

id.description: The unique identifier of the Stripe Checkout session.

url.description:
The URL to redirect the user to complete the Checkout session.
This may be null if the session is incomplete or improperly initialized.

customer.description: The Stripe customer ID associated with this session.

setupIntentId.description: The ID of the associated Stripe SetupIntent.

setupIntentStatus.description: The status of the associated Stripe SetupIntent.

setupIntentPaymentMethod.description: The payment method attached to the associated SetupIntent.

v1StripeCheckoutSession.title:
Represents a Stripe Session abstraction containing Checkout session and SetupIntent references.
buf:lint:ignore QDRANT_CLOUD_REQUIRED_ENTITY_FIELDS

v1StripeSetupIntentStatus.description:
Represents the status of a SetupIntent in Stripe.

 - STRIPE_SETUP_INTENT_STATUS_UNSPECIFIED: Default unspecified value.
 - STRIPE_SETUP_INTENT_STATUS_REQUIRES_PAYMENT_METHOD: A payment method is required to proceed.
 - STRIPE_SETUP_INTENT_STATUS_REQUIRES_CONFIRMATION: The SetupIntent is ready to be confirmed.
 - STRIPE_SETUP_INTENT_STATUS_REQUIRES_ACTION: The SetupIntent requires further action (e.g., 3D Secure).
 - STRIPE_SETUP_INTENT_STATUS_PROCESSING: The SetupIntent is being processed.
 - STRIPE_SETUP_INTENT_STATUS_CANCELED: The SetupIntent has been canceled.
 - STRIPE_SETUP_INTENT_STATUS_SUCCEEDED: The SetupIntent has succeeded.

v1UpdatePaymentInformationResponse.title: UpdatePaymentInformationResponse is the response from the UpdatePaymentInformation function
